No config. that I know of.  Another version of your JSP hack is that you 
can create new instances via JMX.
St.Ack

acidbluebriggs wrote:
>
> I know that an administrator can start up multiple instances of
> Heritrix by logging into the console and manually starting them up,
> but I was wondering if there was a way to do this via some sort of
> configuration for this to happen at startup.
>
> I mean, I could always do a 'curl' command and call that JSP directly,
> but I didn't want to do such a 'hack'.
>
> Briggs.
>
>
